com.facebook.buck.core.rules.attr

Interface SupportsInputBasedRuleKey

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidBinary, AndroidInstrumentationApk, AndroidLibrary, AndroidPrebuiltAar, AndroidResource, ApkGenrule, AppleDsym, Archive, CalculateClassAbi, CalculateSourceAbi, CGoLibrary, CommandAlias, CompareAbis, CopyNativeLibraries, CxxBinary, CxxGenrule, CxxLibrary, CxxLink, CxxLuaExtension, CxxPrecompiledHeaderTemplate, CxxPrefixHeader, CxxPreprocessAndCompile, CxxPythonExtension, CxxStrip, DefaultJavaLibrary, DexProducedFromJavaLibrary, DLibrary, DummyRDotJava, ExportFile, ExternallyBuiltApplePackage, Filegroup, Genrule, GenruleBinary, HalideLibrary, HaskellLibrary, HeaderSymlinkTree, HeaderSymlinkTreeWithHeaderMap, HeaderSymlinkTreeWithModuleMap, JarGenrule, JavaAnnotationProcessor, JsBundleGenrule, LuaLibrary, MergeThirdPartyJarResources, ModernBuildRule, NoopBuildRule, NoopBuildRuleWithDeclaredAndExtraDeps, OcamlLibrary, PrebuiltCxxLibrary, PrebuiltHaskellLibrary, PrebuiltJar, PreInclude, PythonLibrary, RustCompileRule, RustLibrary, ShTest, SymlinkTree, UnstrippedNativeLibraries, WriteFileHashCode, Zip

    public interface SupportsInputBasedRuleKey
extends BuildRule
    Used to tag a rule that supports input-based rule keys.

    BuildRules implementing this interface will cause rule key to be computed by enumerating their dependencies implicitly through their inputs, which are described by SourcePaths added to their RuleKey.

    Input-based rule keys are generally more accurate than normal rule keys, as they won't necessarily change if the rule key of a dependency changed. Instead, they only change if a the actual inputs to the rule change.

    See Also:
    InputBasedRuleKeyFactory
